CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 13, 1957, pg. 24, reads: " Talking Shop - Above are some of the sports principals in attendance at the annual athletic awards dinner at the Kay Boys Club. Left to right: Embry Robinson, Canadian football star; Henry Ford of the Pittsburgh Steelers; Willie McClung, Steelers; Emanuel Randall and Fran Fogarty, Steelers' business manager.  Seventy-seven awards were presented to athletes of the Kay Club at the affair. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Canadian football player Embry Robinson, Pittsburgh Steelers Henry Ford and Willie McClung, Emanuel Randall, and Fran Fogarty, seated at banquet table in Kay Boys Club for annual athletic awards dinner
